body_html: The build log looks correct. I think the problem is that you have multiple Python environments with different PyTorch packages. In your run time log, torch is loaded from /lib/python3.6/site-packages/, but in your build log it's installed in /home/piotr/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/. Cleaning up the global install should fix it for you.

body: The build log looks correct. I think the problem is that you have multiple Python environments with different PyTorch packages. In your run time log, torch is loaded from `/lib/python3.6/site-packages/`, but in your build log it's installed in `/home/piotr/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/`. Cleaning up the global install should fix it for you.
